}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Samsung]]'' Exynos 5 Dual 5250 :@1.7GHz Dual-Core (ARM Cortex A15) *GPU: Mali-T604 MP4 :Video decoding 1080p60 H.264 *RAM: 2GB (DDR3) *Storage: 8GB eMMC 4.5, 1TB SATA HDD *Video Output: HDMI *Audio Output: SPDIF *WiFi & BT: 802.11a/b/g/n, BT 4.0 *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB (OTG) *Power: 12V/3300mA barrel
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.engadget.com/2013-02-24-samsung-homesync-android-set-top-box.html ''Samsung HomeSync Android TV box packs 1TB HDD, dual-core CPU'' on '''Engadget'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2013/10/samsung-launches-299-homesync-android-powered-media-center.html ''Samsung launches $299 HomeSync Android-powered media center'' on '''Liliputing''']
==See also== *[[Arndale Board]]
